forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 67F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 63F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 64F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
